info: The proposed Project 1 will include: (i) Bhagalpur water supply subproject; (ii) Hydro-geological assessment of the ground water in Gaya and Darbhanga;  (iii) Consulting services for investment program management; (iv) Consulting services for construction supervision and subproject design; (v) Project management and implementation units operations; and (vi) Capacity building and reform activities outside SPUR in Bhagalpur.
name: BIHAR URBAN DEVELOPMENT INVESTMENT PROGRAM- TRANCHE 1
